child-care-authorization-form.title: Child Care Authorization Form
child-care-authorization-form.description: Give caregivers permission to make decisions for your child when you're not available. Required for babysitters, schools, and daycares.

child-care-contract.title: Child Care Contract
child-care-contract.description: Hire a nanny, babysitter, or daycare provider with clear terms about care, payment, and responsibilities.

child-custody-agreement.title: Child Custody Agreement
child-custody-agreement.description: Decide where children will live and when they'll spend time with each parent after separation or divorce.

child-medical-consent.title: Child Medical Consent
child-medical-consent.description: Allow others to make medical decisions for your child in emergencies when you can't be reached.

child-support-agreement.title: Child Support Agreement
child-support-agreement.description: Set fair financial support payments for children after parents separate or divorce. Covers basic needs and expenses.

child-travel-consent.title: Child Travel Consent
child-travel-consent.description: Give permission for your child to travel with the other parent, relatives, or on school trips.

cohabitation-agreement.title: Cohabitation Agreement
cohabitation-agreement.description: Live together as a couple without marriage while protecting your individual assets and defining responsibilities.

divorce-settlement-agreement.title: Divorce Settlement Agreement
divorce-settlement-agreement.description: Divide assets, debts, and responsibilities when ending a marriage. Covers property, custody, and support payments.

dog-breeding-agreement.title: Dog Breeding Agreement
dog-breeding-agreement.description: Breed your dog with someone else's while protecting both parties. Covers stud fees, puppy rights, and health guarantees.

elder-care-agreement.title: Elder Care Agreement
elder-care-agreement.description: Arrange care for elderly family members. Covers caregiving responsibilities, living arrangements, and financial support.

guardianship-agreement.title: Guardianship Agreement
guardianship-agreement.description: Appoint someone to care for your children if something happens to you. Essential for single parents and families.

horse-boarding-agreement.title: Horse Boarding Agreement
horse-boarding-agreement.description: Board your horse at a stable with clear terms about care, feeding, riding privileges, and monthly costs.

marriage-separation-agreement.title: Marriage Separation Agreement
marriage-separation-agreement.description: Separate from your spouse while remaining legally married. Covers living arrangements, finances, and children.

parenting-plan.title: Parenting Plan
parenting-plan.description: Detailed plan for raising children after divorce or separation. Covers schedules, decisions, holidays, and communication.

personal-care-agreement.title: Personal Care Agreement
personal-care-agreement.description: Hire someone to provide personal care services for yourself or a family member. Covers daily living assistance.

pet-addendum.title: Pet Addendum
pet-addendum.description: Add pet rules to your lease agreement. Covers pet deposits, restrictions, and tenant responsibilities for damages.

pet-agreement.title: Pet Agreement
pet-agreement.description: Set rules and responsibilities for pet ownership in shared living situations or rental properties.

pet-custody-agreement.title: Pet Custody Agreement
pet-custody-agreement.description: Decide who gets the pets when a couple separates or divorces. Covers visitation, expenses, and care responsibilities.

postnuptial-agreement.title: Postnuptial Agreement
postnuptial-agreement.description: Protect assets and define financial responsibilities after you're already married. Similar to prenup but signed during marriage.

power-of-attorney-for-child.title: Power Of Attorney For Child
power-of-attorney-for-child.description: Give someone legal authority to make decisions for your minor child when you're unavailable or incapacitated.

prenuptial-agreement.title: Prenuptial Agreement
prenuptial-agreement.description: Protect your assets and define financial responsibilities before getting married. Prevents disputes if relationship ends.

separation-agreement.title: Separation Agreement
separation-agreement.description: Legally separate from your spouse while working out divorce details. Covers temporary arrangements for children and finances.
